CRFs.name: Brief Pain Inventory (BPI)
CRFs.description: A self-report questionnaire measuring pain severity and interference with daily activities.

CRFs.name: BPI Pain Interference
CRFs.description: Assesses how pain impacts various aspects of daily life, including mood, work, and social activities.

CRFs.name: BPI Pain Severity
CRFs.description: Measures the intensity of pain at its worst, least, average, and current levels.

CRFs.name: Demographics
CRFs.description: Collects baseline demographic information, including age, gender, ethnicity, education, income, SDOH and other background details.

CRFs.name: Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD-2)
CRFs.description: A 2-item screener for generalized anxiety disorder, assessing symptoms like feeling nervous and unable to control worrying.

CRFs.name: GAD2 Pain
CRFs.description: A version of the GAD-2 screener used specifically for populations experiencing pain.

CRFs.name: NIDA-Modified ASSIST L2
CRFs.description: A screening tool for adolescents (ages 11-17), adapted from the NIDA ASSIST to assess substance use, including alcohol.

CRFs.name: PCS-6
CRFs.description: A shortened version of the Pain Catastrophizing Scale (PCS) focusing on key items related to catastrophic thinking about pain.

CRFs.name: PCS-Child
CRFs.description: An adapted version of the PCS for children to self-report catastrophic thoughts related to pain.

CRFs.name: PCS-Parent
CRFs.description: An adapted version of the PCS for parents to report on their perceptions of their child’s pain experience.

CRFs.name: Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory (PedsQL)
CRFs.description: A tool to assess the quality of life in children across physical, emotional, social, and school functioning.

CRFs.name: PEG Pain
CRFs.description: A 3-item scale assessing pain’s impact on enjoyment of life and general activity.

CRFs.name: Patient Global Impression of Change (PGIC) Pain
CRFs.description: Assesses the patient’s perception of change or improvement in their pain condition.

CRFs.name: Patient Global Impression of Severity (PGIS)
CRFs.description: Measures the patient’s perception of the severity of their condition.

CRFs.name: Patient Health Questionnaire 2 (PHQ2)
CRFs.description: A 2-item screener for depression symptoms, focusing on interest or pleasure in activities and feeling down or hopeless.

CRFs.name: PHQ2 Pain
CRFs.description: A version of the PHQ2 specifically assessing depressive symptoms in relation to pain.

CRFs.name: PROMIS Physical Function Pain
CRFs.description: Part of the PROMIS suite, assessing physical function as it relates to pain.

CRFs.name: PROMIS Physical Function Pain 6b
CRFs.description: A subset of PROMIS Physical Function items related to pain, version 6b.

CRFs.name: PROMIS Sleep Disturbance 6a
CRFs.description: A subset of PROMIS items measuring sleep disturbance, version 6a.

CRFs.name: Sleep Duration Pain
CRFs.description: Assesses sleep duration specifically for individuals experiencing pain.

CRFs.name: Adolescent Sleep-Wake Scale (SleepASWS)
CRFs.description: A self-reported measure of sleep patterns and quality in adolescents.

CRFs.name: TAPS Pain
abbreviations: Tobacco, Alcohol, Prescription Medication, and Other Substance Use Pain
CRFs.description: The TAPS tool adapted to assess substance use in individuals with pain.
